twine1.name: DotGraph
twine1.author: M. C. DeMarco
twine1.description: Displays a graph of your story, with several options for color-coding, clustering, and labeling nodes; it also detects unreachable nodes and terminal leaves

twine1.name: DotScap
twine1.author: M. C. DeMarco
twine1.description: A DotGraph-like format that converts your story into a Scapple mind-map graph and includes a subset of DotGraph's rendering options

twine1.name: Journal
twine1.author: Leon Arnott
twine1.description: A horizontal variant of the Twine 1 stretchtext story format Jonah

twine1.name: Paloma
twine1.author: M. C. DeMarco
twine1.description: a Jonah-style stretchtext story format for Twine 1 and 2

twine1.name: PrePub
twine1.author: M. C. DeMarco
twine1.description: converts a Twine 1 or 2 story into a MultiMarkdown format used for generating eBooks

twine1.name: Wasteland
twine1.author: Jessica Paoli
twine1.description: a semantic Twine [1] Story Format focused on readability

twine2.name: Adventures
twine2.author: Longwelwind
twine2.description: A story format to create RPG stories with health, loot, gold and more. See its documentation

twine2.name: Adventure Tome
twine2.author: Sophie Houlden
twine2.description: Displays twine stories as playable adventure gamebooks, complete with character sheet and full undo/redo.

twine2.name: Botscripten
twine2.author: Aibex, Inc
twine2.description: An interactive chat viewer

twine2.author: Brandon Tom
twine2.description: Boundless is a React-based story format for Twine

twine2.name: CopyPaste
twine2.author: cocoknightcom
twine2.description: A Twine 2 Proofing Story Format that cuts it.

twine2.name: Daelog
twine2.author: Dan Cox
twine2.description: Experimental Twine story format incorporating Tracery

twine2.name: DotGraph
twine2.author: M. C. DeMarco
twine2.description: displays a graph of your story, with several options for color-coding, clustering, and labeling nodes; it also detects unreachable nodes and terminal leaves

twine2.name: DotScap
twine2.author: M. C. DeMarco
twine2.description: a DotGraph-like format that converts your story into a Scapple mind-map graph and includes a subset of DotGraph's rendering options

twine2.name: Dramaturge
twine2.author: Emma G. Kowalski
twine2.description: A minimal story format for authors experienced with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

twine2.name: enscree
twine2.author: M. C. DeMarco
twine2.description: exports a Twine 2 story into a MultiMarkdown format used for importing into Scrivener or Scree

twine2.name: entwee
twine2.author: M. C. DeMarco
twine2.description: exports a Twine 2 story into the twee plain text format and automatically downloads it as text

twine2.name: Entweedle
twine2.author: Michael McCollum
twine2.description: the original twee-ifying story format for Twine 2

twine2.name: Foil
twine2.author: Kevin Groat
twine2.description: similar to Snowman, and undocumented at the moment

twine2.name: Gately
twine2.author: Furkle Industries
twine2.description: a rumored story format

twine2.name: Illume
twine2.author: Michael McCollum
twine2.description: an "experiment in producing a proofing format for Twine 2 that offers more functionality than a simple text dump"

twine2.name: Jinx
twine2.author: Derek Timm-Brock
twine2.description: A Twine 2 story format for building and running interactive comics in Twine

twine2.name: JTwine-to-JSON
twine2.author: Jason Francis
twine2.description: A story format for converting a Twine 2 story to JSON with special support for Harlowe 3.x. Specifically created for MSCH-C220 at Indiana University—Bloomington

twine2.name: Mirapol
twine2.description: a rumored story format

twine2.name: Moontale
twine2.author: Hamish Milne
twine2.description: A Twine 2 story format that outputs Lua

twine2.name: OldFashioned
twine2.author: Blair MacIntyre
twine2.description: An AR extension to the Twine 2 port of the Twine 1 SugarCube story format. See its documentation.

twine2.name: Poof
twine2.author: Chapel
twine2.description: A proofing format.

twine2.name: Poste-Monstre-Trésor
twine2.author: Diane Landais
twine2.description: A custom Twine 2 format to render stories as a printable, linear blocks of text.

twine2.name: Protagonist
twine2.author: Massive Danger
twine2.description: A Twine story format with power!

twine2.name: reach
twine2.author: Mike Spears
twine2.description: reach is a twine story format for authoring immersive XR narratives, environments and prototypes.

twine2.name: Screentastic
twine2.author: Sean Simon
twine2.description: A Twine 2 Story Format for creating Interactive Screenplays.

twine2.name: Snowcat
twine2.author: Michael Ramaker
twine2.description: creating a merger of Snowman and Harlowe

twine2.name: Trialogue
twine2.author: Philo van Kemenade
twine2.description: a chat story format

twine2.name: TwineJson
twine2.author: Cauli Tomaz
twine2.description: exports a story to JSON, possibly in hierarchical format

twine2.name: twine-monogatari
twine2.author: Haroldo O. Pinheiro
twine2.description: Allows one to use Twine to create Visual Novels for the Monogatari engine.

twine2.name: TwineSpace
twine2.author: Dan Cox, PS Berge, Jack Murray, Anastasia Salter
twine2.description: Twine 2 story format supporting locative and mixed reality projects

twine2.name: twine2-story-format
twine2.author: Exercism
twine2.description: No description or website provided.

twine2.name: TwingeX
twine2.author: Ben (that guy) Winding
twine2.description: The extremely simple 'twingex' format.

twine2.name: Twison
twine2.author: Emilia Lazer-Walker
twine2.description: Export your Twine 2 story as a JSON document

twine2.name: Twize
twine2.author: Derek Timm-Brock
twine2.description: An opinionated Twine storyformat designed for making Wizard Town-style interactive comics

twine2.name: WritingFantasy
twine2.author: Sophie Houlden
twine2.description: Outputs a twine story in gamebook format, listing all passages in a shuffled order, and changing links to a '(turn to 123)' instruction

twine2.name: Twiorg
twine2.author: Danish Khatri
twine2.description: Export your Twine 2 story as an Org Mode Org file

twine2.name: AdventureTome
twine2.author: Sophie Houlden
twine2.description: Displays twine stories as playable adventure gamebooks, complete with character sheet and full undo/redo.

twine2.name: Twine to JSON
twine2.author: Jonathan Schoonhoven
twine2.description: Convert Twine story to JSON
